text: Hey does anyone know if its possible to use event trackers on click events inside gated assets for individual users? i.e. I have a gated video asset and I'd like to have a tracker on the button that prompts the video return the users name/email via tracker

I’m not new to HubSpot, but it’s been a while and things have changed.

I wanted to use a template pack from the Marketplace to help speed up development. Once I have the templates, modules, coded files, etc., do I just edit them as is? Can I rename them for the specific project? Do I clone them first? I’ve always started my templates from scratch before. Thanks!
